prompt.task: Transform the following idea into a concise Product Requirements Document (PRD).
prompt.instructions: - Analyze the idea to identify core objectives, target users, and desired features. - Define the scope, listing in-scope features and explicitly out-of-scope items. - Specify technical requirements, including key libraries, APIs, and file paths (read-only: {CODEBASE_FILES}, writeable: {WRITEABLE_FILES}). - Structure the PRD with sections for executive summary, objectives, features, technical requirements, and success metrics.
